channel.title: No1 ever helps me :( [317] delta
channel.description: ok i am trying to make a ::help. like when some1 does that it contacts all staff saying that they the player needs help. how do i make this? any1 got a command? if not. then do you have a ::noclipon ? and ::noclipoff? and if you have none of these do you have an ::onlinestaff that tell you what staff r online? thanks if u have any please post em i really need. plz plz plz

item.title: No1 ever helps me :( [317] delta
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“ravens, post:2, topic:405319”]if(command.startswith(“help”){//command
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && playerRights > 0) {
sM(playername + “needs help!”);
}
}
}

sorry but leeched from allstar O.o

note: you will have to edit this probably will not work without minor change but its the basic idea

online staff

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“players”)) {
sendQuest("@dre@SERVER NAME - Online Players", 8144);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@Online staff(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
+ “):”, 8145);
int line = 8146;
for (int i = 1; i < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
client playa = getClient(i);
if (!validClient(i))
continue;
if (playa.playerName != null && playa.playerRights > 0) {
String title = “”;
if (playa.playerRights == 1) {
title = "Mod, ";
} else if (playa.playerRights == 2) {
title = “Admin, “;
}
title += “level-” + playa.combatLevel;
String extra = “”;
sendQuest(”@dre@” + extra + playa.playerName + “@dbl@ (”
+ title + ") is at " + playa.absX + ", "
+ playa.absY, line);
line++;
}
}
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}
i did not make the second command, just changed a ::players command[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: No1 ever helps me :( [317] delta
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

if(command.startswith(“help”){//command
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && playerRights > 0) {
sM(playername + “needs help!”);
}
}
}

note: you will have to edit this probably will not work without minor change but its the basic idea

online staff

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“players”)) {
sendQuest("@dre@SERVER NAME - Online Players", 8144);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@Online staff(" + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()
+ “):”, 8145);
int line = 8146;
for (int i = 1; i < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
client playa = getClient(i);
if (!validClient(i))
continue;
if (playa.playerName != null && playa.playerRights > 0) {
String title = “”;
if (playa.playerRights == 1) {
title = "Mod, ";
} else if (playa.playerRights == 2) {
title = “Admin, “;
}
title += “level-” + playa.combatLevel;
String extra = “”;
sendQuest(”@dre@” + extra + playa.playerName + “@dbl@ (”
+ title + ") is at " + playa.absX + ", "
+ playa.absY, line);
line++;
}
}
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}
i did not make the second command, just changed a ::players command
